Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: A comma-separated list of adjectives which are added to the default detail, when the liquid is neither fresh nor aged (rotten). ~ Importance: OPTIONAL -- the consumable will be perfectly fine without this property, but you may set it in case you wish to provide above-average detail.

A comma-separated list of adjectives which are added to the default detail, when the liquid goes bad/stale. ~ Importance: RECOMMENDED -- this property may be left out, but you are recommended to include it. ~ Note: be sure to choose an adjective that matches the brief-aged, if one such exists. For example, if the brief-aged goes "stale beer", then the adjective-aged should contain "stale" so that players can type "look at stale beer" or "empty stale beer" etc.

A comma-separated list of adjectives which are added to the default detail, when the liquid is fresh. ~ Importance: RECOMMENDED -- this property may be left out, but you are recommended to include it. ~ Note: be sure to choose an adjective that matches the brief-fresh, if one such exists. For example, if the brief-fresh goes "foamy beer", then the adjective-fresh should contain "foamy" so that players can type "look at foamy beer" or "empty foamy beer" etc.
The liquid's brief description. ~ Importance: RECOMMENDED -- this property may be left out, but you are recommended to include it.
The liquid's brief description, when the liquid has gone bad/stale. ~ Importance: RECOMMENDED -- this property may be left out, but you are recommended to include it.

The liquid's brief description, when the liquid is "fresh". ~ Importance: OPTIONAL -- the consumable will be perfectly fine without this property, but you may set it in case you wish to provide above-average detail.
The liquid's examine description. ~ Importance: RECOMMENDED -- this property may be left out, but you are recommended to include it.
The liquid's examine description, when the liquid has gone bad/stale. ~ Importance: RECOMMENDED -- this property may be left out, but you are recommended to include it.

The liquid's examine description, when fresh. ~ Importance: OPTIONAL -- the consumable will be perfectly fine without this property, but you may set it in case you wish to provide above-average detail.
The liquid's look description. ~ Importance: RECOMMENDED -- this property may be left out, but you are recommended to include it.
The liquid's look description, when the liquid has gone bad/stale. ~ Importance: RECOMMENDED -- this property may be left out, but you are recommended to include it.
The liquid's look description, when fresh. ~ Importance: OPTIONAL -- the consumable will be perfectly fine without this property, but you may set it in case you wish to provide above-average detail.

The name of the liquid, written like a "brief" description. VALID EXAMPLE: ale INVALID EXAMPLE: An apple. ~ Importance: OBLIGATORY -- this property must be set for the liquid to function properly ~ Note: the sname and pname fields should at least contain the name in the respective singular and plural form. If the liquid name is 'ale', then the sname 'ale' and the pname 'ales' must exist.

The description of the liquid's scent, as a complete sentence (like a "look" description). VALID EXAMPLE: It smells dark and bitter. INVALID EXAMPLE: dark and bitter ~ Importance: RECOMMENDED -- this property may be left out, but you are recommended to include it.
The description of the liquid's scent, when the liquid has gone bad/stale. ~ Importance: RECOMMENDED -- this property may be left out, but you are recommended to include it.

The liquid's scent, when the liquid is "fresh". ~ Importance: OPTIONAL -- the consumable will be perfectly fine without this property, but you may set it in case you wish to provide above-average detail.

The taste of the liquid, as a complete sentence (like a "look" description). VALID EXAMPLE: A thick and hearty flavor. INVALID EXAMPLE: thick and hearty flavor ~ Importance: OBLIGATORY -- this property must be set for the liquid to function properly
The description of the liquid's taste, when the liquid has gone bad/stale. ~ Importance: RECOMMENDED -- this property may be left out, but you are recommended to include it.
The taste of the liquid, when fresh. ~ Importance: OPTIONAL -- the consumable will be perfectly fine without this property, but you may set it in case you wish to provide above-average detail.

Notes:Category.Notes:Note: This is the reference object for LIQUIDS. It can be duplicated and renamed, after which the individual properties may be replaced or deleted accordingly.
